actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Lincoln Homestead National Recreation Area.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Lincoln Homestead National Recreation area on Embarrass River, Coles County, Illinois. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Lincoln Homestead National Recreation Area.
